page.title: 07BARFORD ST. MARTIN SCHOOL
page.content: I go to a school called Barford St. Martin First School. It is rather small but I like it. It was built in 1854. We have two classes. We have 43 children in the whole school. In the Infant class there are 19 children under 7 and in the Junior class there are 19 children aged 7 to 9. We have two playgrounds, one of them has a train in it and the other has a climbing frame with a slide. We can play in the school garden in the summer. We have a playing field near the school. We have three teachers. Two are here all the time and one comes one day a week. Most of the children live in Barford, but some do not live in the village and come on the coach.
